name: History
description: Your Intelligence (History) check measures your ability to recall lore about historical events, legendary people, ancient kingdoms, past disputes, recent wars, and lost civilizations.
typicalUses: Recall lore about a historical event or period
Identify a historically significant object or location
Know information about legendary heroes or villains
Determine the cultural significance of a tradition or custom
Recognize a coat of arms, banner, or heraldic symbol
